author: Josh Margolin, Aaron Katersky, Sasha Pezenik
title: Jewish communities in NY continue to hold religious gatherings despite orders
description: A look at some Orthodox Jewish communities and how they are and are not abiding by social distancing as Passover's on its way
content:
The centuries-old premium Jewish communities place on religious gatherings is running headlong into the need for isolation amid the unyielding coronavirus pandemic.
Like other religious institutions, Jewish communities around the country are attempting to ad… [+7373 chars]
